name: Screenshot Current Screen & Share to Slack

steps.goal: Take a screenshot of the current screen using the keyevent action with code 120 (KEYCODE_SYSRQ for screenshot). Wait 2 seconds for the screenshot to save.

Search for the #bugs channel using the search icon. Open it. Tap the + or attachment icon to attach a file. Navigate to the Screenshots folder and select the most recent screenshot. Add the caption 'Bug found on this screen - see screenshot' and send it using submit_message.
